CustomField.description: Used for PopUp on AR Lightning App Page to warn about Expiring Premium
CustomField.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c , 'New Business'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Need to Submit'), RecordTypeId = '01237000000Xu4C', ISBLANK( Expiring_Premium__c ) )
CustomField.label: AR_Warning_Expiring_Premium
